about.name: Kinjal Raykarmakar
about.summary: 3rd-year Computer Science Engineering Undergraduate and Backend Developer Intern at UNIGO Cabs. A problem-solver who learns almost every day! Experienced in developing RESTful APIs for Web/Mobile Apps using JavaScript and software using Python, alongside Java, C and C++. Digging code, folding paper and writing my journal are constants from the universal set of hobbies! Physics and Space make me nerdy.
